overview_summary: All four profiled neighbors have an **unknown** stance on the development, as none have made public statements or taken visible action regarding local projects. Likewise, none are high-profile community figures—each appears to have **low** direct influence in local governance or decision-making.

neighbors.name: Robert J. Van Valkenburg Sr.
neighbors.claims: The Van Valkenburg family has been part of Greene County’s farming community since at least the early 1810s ([www.tracingyourrootsgcny.com](https://www.tracingyourrootsgcny.com/history_of_greene_county_section_four.htm#:~:text=was%20Helmus%20Chrysler,wagon%20over%20the%20road%20the)). Robert J. Van Valkenburg Sr. is listed as a landowner in the Hannacroix area, but no evidence was found of him participating in local meetings or development debates ([www.greenegovernment.com](https://www.greenegovernment.com/contacts#:~:text=No%20,van%20valk)).

approach_recommendations.engage: Engage via a trusted agricultural peer who can discuss the project’s respect for farmland and local heritage, addressing any concerns about land use changes.

neighbors.name: Bruce J. Whittaker
neighbors.claims: County records list Bruce J. Whittaker (with and without middle initial) as the owner of multiple adjacent parcels in this vicinity ([greene.sdgnys.com](https://greene.sdgnys.com/?cty=19#:~:text=Tax%20ID%20%2F%20SBL%20Last,)). There is no public record of Whittaker taking a stand on local development proposals or being active in any civic capacity ([www.greenegovernment.com](https://www.greenegovernment.com/contacts#:~:text=No%20,van%20valk)).

approach_recommendations.engage: Initiate personal outreach emphasizing practical issues like land access and infrastructure. Having a neighbor or local farm official he knows introduce the project could help build trust.

neighbors.name: Cynthia A. Costello
neighbors.claims: Cynthia A. Costello resides on Johnny Cake Lane in rural Greene County, according to public directory records ([freepeoplesearch.com](https://freepeoplesearch.com/Costello/Cynthia/#:~:text=Address%20History%3A%20223%20Johnny%20Cake,Valley%2C%20CA%2092284%3B%20Ravena%2C%20NY)). No news articles or community records were found indicating any involvement by Costello in local development issues ([www.greenegovernment.com](https://www.greenegovernment.com/contacts#:~:text=No%20,van%20valk)).

approach_recommendations.engage: Approach one-on-one with reassurance about preserving the quiet, rural character of the area. Emphasize minimal impacts on scenery and property value to address any unspoken worries.

neighbors.name: Mark Flach
neighbors.claims: Mark Flach comes from a well-known local racing family and rose to prominence as a big-block modified driver at Lebanon Valley Speedway ([www.dirttrackdigest.com](https://www.dirttrackdigest.com/featured/2019/04/11/mark-flach-a-racing-life-dtd-exclusive/#:~:text=ImageMark%20Flach%E2%80%99s%20meteoric%20rise%20to,his%20ascension%20to%20the%20upper)). From a young age he followed in the tire tracks of his uncle, veteran racer John Flach, and was competing in motorsports as early as age five ([www.dirttrackdigest.com](https://www.dirttrackdigest.com/featured/2019/04/11/mark-flach-a-racing-life-dtd-exclusive/#:~:text=%E2%80%9CThe%20first%20time%20I%20was,path%20in%20the%20family%20business)). There is no indication that Flach has been publicly engaged in debates over local development projects ([www.greenegovernment.com](https://www.greenegovernment.com/contacts#:~:text=No%20,van%20valk)).

approach_recommendations.engage: Reach out in a friendly, informal manner—possibly via a mutual acquaintance—focusing on straightforward facts. Given his background, a practical, no-nonsense discussion addressing any technical or property concerns is likely to resonate.
